anri-du-toit:

when i was much, much younger i read a series of books (possibly only one book??) that i now have almost no recollection of whatsoever

but i remember that there was some sort of weird dark matter/energy/??? that existed in this world and fucked everything up

and there was some kind of murder but…

That … sounds like a pretty awesome story. Does anybody know where it’s from? Please read the whole thing.
link-text: unleash the fucking bats: this has been driving me crazy for years
